## Meeting Schedule and Overview

```{r, warning=FALSE}
Week <- c(1:13)
Date <- c("1/24", "1/31", "2/7", "2/14","2/21", "2/28", "3/7", "3/21",
          "3/28", "4/4", "4/11","4/18", "4/25")
Topic <- c("Intro and Shiny","Shiny Basics", "Design Basics","Effective Outreach",
             "Graphic Design","Class work time",
             "Draft presentations","Class work time","Class work time",
           "Class work time","Class work time",
             "Presentations","Presentations")
Speaker <- c("Instructors","Dekker", "Ferria","Carubin","Instructors","Menezes", 
             "Students","Instructors","Instructors",
             "Instructors","Instructors",
           "Students", "Students")
Reading <- c("DC Shiny Basics Ch. 1", "", "", "", "", 
             "", "", "", "",
             "", "", "", 
             "")
 
meetings <- cbind(Week, Date, Topic, Speaker, Reading)

kable(meetings, "html") %>%  
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive"))
```
